/home/developer/emsdk/upstream/emscripten/em++ -s USE_SDL=0 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -s FORCE_FILESYSTEM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=[_main,_load_rom_from_js,_get_video_buffer,_get_video_buffer_size,_set_button,_get_audio_buffer,_get_audio_samples_available,_fill_audio_buffer,_set_audio_muted] -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=[ccall,cwrap,FS,HEAPU8,HEAPF32] --shell-file /home/developer/projects/GB-EMU/src/index.html @CMakeFiles/gb-emu.dir/objects1 -o gb-emu.html
